Of course! Based on your user preferences, I would recommend "Aladdin" and "What If..."

"Aladdin" is a classic Disney movie with catchy music and a heartwarming story of self-discovery and love. Starring Scott Weinger and Lea Salonga, it's a fun and lighthearted film that explores themes of kindness, perseverance, and the power of wishing.

"What If...", on the other hand, is a more thought-provoking movie that delves into the concept of fate and the choices we make in life. Starring Kristy Swanson and John Ratzenberger, it's a quirky and engaging film that explores the idea of what might have been if we had taken different paths in life. Both movies are sure to provide an enjoyable viewing experience!
